title: MacBook Pro 2016 15 inch no sound
message:
On the first post you wrote that changed out the speakers but did not solve the issue - can you please tell a whole story? So which speakers did work and what did you do to get them work again?
thanks in advance ?

title: MacBook Pro 2016 15 inch no sound
message: [USER="14386"]ZAKLINTOWN[/USER]   sorry for my late response.. Thing is , the speakers that were installed apparently were not good , also I was a bit confused when the earphones wouldn't work either , but I figured I had to manually flip the output to headphones before it worked . As for the speakers , I had to changer them again . removing the spears its quite an issue to , cus there's a higher chance of damaging them , in the process
